#summary UrukDroid Cisco VPN service.

= Introduction =

CISCO developed it's own standard for VPN. Because of it, we have to use separate VPN tool. Luckily there is open source "[http://www.unix-ag.uni-kl.de/~massar/vpnc/ vpnc]".
